name: enerproject
description: Plataforma integral de gestión de proyectos energéticos

scripts.dev: npm run dev -w enerproject & npm run dev -w @enerproject/frontend
scripts.build: npm run build -w @enerproject/shared && npm run build -w enerproject && npm run build -w @enerproject/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w enerproject && npm run lint -w @enerproject/frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w enerproject && npm run lint:fix -w @enerproject/frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w @enerproject/frontend && tsc -b packages/backend packages/shared
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w @enerproject/shared && npm install -w enerproject && npm install -w @enerproject/frontend

author: Wilder Montaner
